page.title: 14MEDIA-SEE ENTERTAINMENT ALSO
page.content: {RADIO:BRITISH BROADCASTING CORPORATION {(BBC).}4 CHANNELS -GOOD COVERAGE {BBC LOCAL.}1 CHANNEL -AREA COVER {COMMERCIAL.}2 CHANNELS - BBC LONDON AND RADIO MERCURY {TELEVISION:BBC.}2 CHANNELS {COMMERCIAL.}2 CHANNELS {SATELLITE.}PLANNED 1990s {VIDEOS:}BIG SELECTION AVAILABLE SOME NOT SUITABLE FOR ANY AGE GROUP {NEWSPAPERS:}ALL NATIONALS AVAILABLE GOOD SELECTION OF LOCALS {MAGAZINES:}ALL AVAILABLE ALL SUBJECTS {LIBRARIES:}TRAVELLING ONE VISITS BUT NEARBY TOWNS HAVE FULL SERVICE INCL MUSIC/EDUCATION {PAMPHLETS:}LOCAL TOPICS AVAILABLE {CHURCHES:}PARISH MAGAZINES PRODUCED REGULARLY.GOOD "WHATS ON" {TELEVISION OVERLAY:}CEEFAX / ORACLE {REFERENCE:}FULL SERVICE AT LIBRARIES {"THERE IS NO EXCUSE FOR NOT KNOWING"
